titles.title: A bill to authorize the acceptance of a donation of land for addition to Big Bend National Park, in the State of Texas.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, OMB.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources received executive comment from Interior Department. Favorable.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 8/7/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to accept the donation of specified lands for addition to the Big Bend National Park, Texas.
